title: Dutch bean stew with bacon
directions: Heat a frying pan without oil or butter and fry the bacon in 4 min. On medium heat until crispy. Add the stir-fry vegetables and fry for 4 minutes. Stir frequently.
Drain the onions and bean mixture and add along with the tomatoes and raisins to the pan. Shovel and leave for 5 minutes. Simmer on low heat. Season with pepper and salt.
ingredients: 740 g bean mixture peas, brown & white beans
